channel.title: Haskell on WY Computer Science
channel.description: Recent content in Haskell on WY Computer Science

item.title: Typeclass Notes
item.description: Num: Addition, multiplication, a way to convert from an integer. Also absolute value and negation. Real: Part of the real number line. Ordered numbers. toRational. Does not imply decimals! Enum: Next and previous (succ-essor and pred-ecessor). Integral: Integer division. Fractional: “Decimal” division. Floating: transcendental functions (exponentials, trig, pi, e). RealFrac: truncate and round. RealFloat: efficient floating point.

item.title: Repl.it
item.description: A summary of any special problems that have arisen with repl.it.

item.title: Source Code Files (ghci)
item.description: Writing a file is different from typing in an interpreter like repl.it or ghci.
